body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Evaline Jordan Hinton on August 18, 1842. Father of John D. Hinton, Malinda Hinton, America Hinton, Martha Hinton, and Samuel R. Hinton. Farmer in Fleming County in 1850 and 1860.
